text: Electrons don't orbit the nucleus like planets. They exist in fuzzy probability clouds. 🌫️⚛️
Time runs slower when you're near a massive object. So technically, your feet age slower than your head. 🕰️🦶🧠
Quantum entanglement means particles can influence each other instantly, even if they're galaxies apart. It's the ultimate long-distance relationship. 💌🌌
Empty space isn't empty. Virtual particles are popping in and out of existence constantly. Space is basically a chaotic party. 🎉🕳️
